name: Out of a nightmare
description:
This puzzle game is played either with the arrow keys or wasd.

You have to get the 5 question marks on every level to activate the portal and be able to go to the next level.

Unluckily we had some bugs and so, the version for the jam can only be played up to level 5, without the extra level and the credits.

After the jam we'll add a level that's ice and a racing track, so that you can see how fast you can move through the course :)

This was the first game that the two of us made and we'd be really happy if you played our game and left a comment! :D
